definition: to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate

sentences.english: The film anthropomorphized the lives of the penguins.
sentences.chinese: 电影将企鹅旳生活拟人化。

sentences.english: Or is this just rampant anthropomorphism?
sentences.chinese: 仍是这只是武断的拟人论？

sentences.english: A brand is like a persona with a clear function to perform.
sentences.chinese: 品牌是一个能实施明确功能的“虚拟人”。

sentences.english: This is a safety net to avoid anthropomorphism.
sentences.chinese: 这是避免拟人化的安全策略。

sentences.english: What are the similarities and differences between personified wisdom and the incarnated Lord Jesus Christ?
sentences.chinese: 被拟人化的智慧与道成肉身的主耶稣基督有哪些异同？

sentences.english: "You tend to personify things that you think about a lot, " she says.
sentences.chinese: “反复思考一样东西，你会渐渐把它拟人化，”她说。

sentences.english: Angle legs, soft edges and cable in the middle of giving her light anthropomorphic characters.
sentences.chinese: 角腿，柔边和拟人给予她的光电缆中间人物。

sentences.english: The on going Virtual Chinese Human Project (VCHP) released some Chinese human datasets recently.
sentences.chinese: 中国虚拟人项目已公开发布了数例人体数据集。

sentences.english: She personifies a certain Iran I’ve tried to evoke since the beginning of this year.
sentences.chinese: 她把我在今年年初想要唤起的那个伊朗拟人化了。

sentences.english: He said the portrayal of the penguins' mating rituals as a love story is a "major" case of anthropomorphism.
sentences.chinese: 他说电影中的婚配仪式纯粹是艺术化的拟人。

sentences.english: Personification strategy and tabu list strategy are presented.
sentences.chinese: 拟人和禁忌表两个策略被给出。

sentences.english: Based on potential field method, a footprint planning method was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一种基于人工势场法的虚拟人足迹规划方法。

sentences.english: Han Jia, you are personifying these gingko trees.
sentences.chinese: 韩佳，你又把银杏树给拟人化了。

sentences.english: The world capital of humanlike robots is Japan.
sentences.chinese: “日本，是“拟人化”机器人的世界之都。

definition: to use sth as a metaphor
line drawing in traditional ink and brush style/simple and straightforward style of writing
pun/play on words/a phrase with a double meaning
